蚆字的基本解释

蚆
bā
〔海蚆〕古书上说的一种贝。

蚆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bā］
［《廣韻》伯加切，平麻，幫。］
［《廣韻》普巴切，平麻，滂。］
软体动物。即贝。古时以贝壳作货币，故亦指货币。

蚆字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚆； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1077第14
【唐韻】普巴切【集韻】披巴切，?音葩。貝也。【爾雅·釋魚】蚆博而頯。【註】頯者，中央廣，兩頭銳。　又【集韻】邦加切【廣韻】伯加切，?音巴。義同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋魚】蚆博而䪻。【註】䪻者，中央廣。〕　謹照原文兩䪻字?改頯。
蚆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蚆字的起名意思

暂无。

〔海蚆〕A kind of shellfish mentioned in ancient books.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bā］
["Guangyun" Bergach, Pingma, Bang. ]
["Guangyun" Pubache, Pingma, Pang. ]
Mollusk. Namely shellfish. In ancient times, shells were used as currency, so it also refers to currency.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚆; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1077 14
【Tang Yun】Pu Baqi 【Ji Yun】Pi Baqi,? Yinpa. Bei also. 【Erya·Shuyu】It is rich and powerful. [Note] The squat is wide in the center and sharp at both ends.　[Jiyun] Bangache [Guangyun] Bergache,? Yinba. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Erya·Shiyu] Bo and Li. [Note] Those who are from the central government. 〕 　 Would you like to follow the original two words? Change 頯.
